column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is my pick for an anniversary dinner and my boyfriend did compliment me for an awesome choice. Yay me! We had their filet mignon
column3: creamed spinach and their elote style corn
column4: all are absolutely perfect. I must say
column5: Â the Bavette team made our anniversary extra special. I cannot wait to come back and hopefully very soon.
